resources.string:
Hi, my name is Chin Ting Wei. 
My friends call me Ting Wei, Kuro, or Kevin, whichever suits their needs. 

I am very interested in tech, 
in fact, I would dedicate most of my time watching Youtube videos about what is currently new in the tech world. 

My interest would go from phones, laptops, PC builds, processor analysis, to funny tech videos. 

When I'm eating or doing work, I would binge watching review videos, 
Basically watching people talk about their experience using their devices. 

I would love to share my knowledge with my friends if they are interested, 
if they are not interested then I won't force them to listen to me brag about it.
